Name: Name
Odoo_Development_Desc: Design, customization and deployment of Odoo modules tailored to your business needs (v16/17/18), with no dependency on ready-made solutions.
Full_Stack_Desc: Creation of modern, fast and secure platforms with ReactJS, NodeJS and PostgreSQL. Smooth interfaces, robust backend.
Frontend_Desc: Responsive and intuitive interface design. Pixel-perfect integration in HTML/CSS/JS or via React for optimal UX.
Consulting_Desc: Technical audit, recommendations, software architecture, technology choices. I guide you to ensure quality and longevity of your project.
Maintenance_Desc: Bug fixes, version updates, continuous improvement of your Odoo systems and websites/applications.
System_Admin_Desc: Installation, configuration and maintenance of Linux and Windows servers. Hosting management, databases, firewalls, and network security.
intro_animated_third: I turn ideas into real products
intro_description: Full-stack developer and Odoo specialist based in Côte d’Ivoire,I’m a self-taught enthusiast who builds 100% hand-coded projects, without CMS or shortcuts, driven by a vision focused on quality, technical mastery, and authentic creation.
aboutme: Full-stack developer and Odoo specialist based in Côte d’Ivoire,I’m a self-taught enthusiast who builds projects 100% hand-coded, with no CMS, no shortcuts — just quality, precision, and authentic craftsmanship.I develop, customize, and maintain your Web and Odoo projects to ensure they are high-performing, scalable, and fully tailored to your needs.
